headline: Bulls facing a ‘make-or-break’ moment as the S&P 500 nears a line in the sand
summary: Expect more downside if the benchmark index slides below 6,720.

headline: S&P 500 turns negative for 2026 as investors add job market to a growing list of worries facing Wall Street
summary: The action in stocks on Thursday showed just how quickly simmering concerns in one corner of the market can boil over into a large-scale rout.

headline: Bitcoin ETF suffers worst decline in over a year — and new investors are now sitting on ugly losses
summary: As investor appetite for bitcoin has faded this year, the iShares Bitcoin Trust has posted net outflows of about $34 million through Wednesday.

headline: Bitcoin’s latest selloff is shattering many of its most enduring myths
summary: The crypto was supposed to be a hedge against currency debasement. Instead, it is trading like just another speculative tech stock, erasing 50% of its value since an early October high.

headline: Oracle’s stock suffers worst eight-day stretch in over two decades. Here’s why.
summary: Hammered by the general software selloff and AI debt concerns, shares of Oracle have shed 22% over eight trading sessions

headline: You’re finally eligible to claim Social Security — but that doesn’t mean it’s the right time to retire
summary: Nearly 30% of people surveyed say Social Security eligibility was a major reason they decided to retire.

headline: TrumpRx’s launch is hours away. Here’s why it may not lower drug prices for most Americans.
summary: The new site is for people in the U.S. who are willing to pay out of pocket for certain brand-name medications, like Zepbound and Wegovy.

headline: Why Uber’s cheap stock is worth a fresh look despite the company’s spending spree
summary: Uber’s stock has fallen more than 20% off peak levels due to concerns about costly futuristic plans, but Deutsche Bank analysts say the investments are worthwhile.

headline: White House to launch direct-to-consumer drug site Trump Rx. Here's what to know
summary: It's still unclear if all patients, particularly those with insurance coverage, will see more cost savings from using that site to buy their medicines.

headline: Good news in a sea of pain sends 2 non-tech stocks higher in Thursday's down market
summary: Every weekday, the Investing Club releases the Homestretch; an actionable afternoon update just in time for the last hour of trading.

headline: This explains silver’s tumble as gold finds a footing in precious-metals rout
summary: Silver’s decline far outpaced that of gold on Thursday, with its sharp price losses leading to a turn lower for the week, even as gold looked to recover much of what it had lost during the recent downturn for precious metals.

headline: Why Microsoft’s stock just lost a big fan in the wake of Alphabet’s earnings
summary: While Google’s cloud growth blew Wall Street away, a Stifel analyst worries it will be difficult for Microsoft Azure to accelerate growth in the near future.

headline: Estée Lauder’s stock heads for worst day ever, as investors were betting on much higher profits
summary: Estée Lauder’s stock tumbled Thursday after the company raised its profit outlook, but not by enough to meet high investor expectations.

headline: Steady bond market shaken by jitters over the job market, U.S.-Iran nuclear talks
summary: U.S. government debt was getting a bid on apparent safe-haven demand Thursday, driven by fresh concerns about the labor market.

headline: Nearing retirement? Stocks seem safer right now than they really are. Here’s why you should add more bonds.
summary: Investors who want to buy bonds have an embarrassment of options.

headline: These 10 industrial stocks look ripe as investors rotate toward the sector
summary: Analysts favor many sector names for rapid sales growth and big gains for the stocks over the next year.

headline: ‘I love being debt-free’: I’m in my mid-50s and buying a house. Do I take out a $400K mortgage or use my Roth IRA?
summary: “I’ll fund $500,000 of that from the sale of my current house.”

headline: Strategy’s sinking stock puts the policy of ‘don’t ever sell your bitcoin’ to the test
summary: Bitcoin’s selloff means Strategy is now losing money on its holdings, which it has been accumulating for nearly six years.

headline: Why Alphabet’s stock is falling despite booming cloud growth
summary: Shares declined Thursday as Google’s staggering $185 billion capital-expenditure forecast overshadowed a blowout fourth quarter.

headline: How Apple’s stock has become a surprise winner during the $1.2 trillion tech wipeout
summary: Apple has been long criticized for its lack of an AI strategy, but now the company’s more measured approach to spending looks attractive.

headline: I’m dating a guy who asks me to pay for most dates — and brings a flask to bars to save money. Is he cheap?
summary: “He says he doesn’t always feel comfortable giving his credit card information out online.”

headline: Surging jobless claims and big layoff announcements are not signs of a collapsing labor market. Here’s why.
summary: Unemployment is still very low and is likely to stay that way.

headline: Hims & Hers launch of compounded $49 Wegovy pill pummels Novo Nordisk’s shares
summary: The compounded pill is less expensive than the oral version of Wegovy, which costs $149 to get started.

headline: Job openings sink to a post-pandemic low. The economy is barely adding any new jobs.
summary: The number of job openings in December fell to the lowest level in eight years if the pandemic era is excluded, underscoring the fragility of the U.S. labor market as the new year got under way.

headline: Broadcom’s stock rises on Google’s spending plans, but Nvidia’s stock extends decline
summary: Google plans to spend up to $185 billion this year, and analysts say its data-center suppliers stand to benefit.

headline: Super Bowl AI ad spat heats up as Altman lashes out at Anthropic campaign
summary: OpenAI recently announced plans to begin testing ads with some ChatGPT users.

headline: Bitcoin crashes below $70,000 for first time in over a year. Is crypto headed for a market reset?
summary: Bitcoin prices fell below $70,000 a coin on Thursday as a painful crypto rout deepened, sending the price of the pioneering digital asset to its lowest level in 15 months.

headline: Jim Cramer's top 10 things to watch in the stock market Thursday
summary: The S&P 500 was headed for a much lower open. Bitcoin fell below $70,000 for the first time since Nov. 2024.

headline: Peloton is losing money again as subscriptions keep falling. The stock is tumbling.
summary: Peloton’s stock falls as the maker of home-fitness products again reported quarterly losses, and as connected-fitness subscriptions fell to a more than four-year low.

headline: ECB holds rates but it's not a 'non-event,' economists say. Here's why
summary: Economists believe the central bank will be comfortable with the inflation rate where it is, for now, but are watching for signs of disinflation.
